_header: O that my tongue could but express

HunHM28175.Transcription:
O that my tovng covld but expres the misserys that my hart doth daly
                    torment…
HunHM28175.Note:
Written as prose, added to blank space in Hours of the Virgin, written
                    by the sixteenth-century hand of George Conyers (see Hanna (1980)
XHanna,  Ralph. 
             “The Index of Middle English Verse and Huntington Library Collections: A
                Checklist of Addenda.” 
             Publications of the Bibliographical Society of America
         74 (1980): 235-58,
                    249).
